policies.title: Vacation Policy
policies.content: Employees are entitled to 15 days of paid vacation per year. Requests must be submitted at least 2 weeks in advance.

policies.title: Remote Work Policy
policies.content: Employees may work remotely up to 3 days per week, subject to manager approval. Must maintain productivity and attend all meetings.

faqs.question: How do I request time off?
faqs.answer: Submit a request through the HR portal with details of dates and reason.

faqs.question: What is the company holiday schedule?
faqs.answer: The company observes all major national holidays. Check the internal calendar for details.
